title: Employee Engagement Survey
description: Your feedback helps us create a better workplace for everyone.

elements.name: jobSatisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied are you with your job?

elements.name: workLifeBalance
elements.title: How would you rate your work-life balance?

elements.name: companyBenefits
elements.title: Which company benefits do you value most?

elements.name: yearsAtCompany
elements.title: How many years have you been with the company?

elements.name: department
elements.title: Which department do you work in?

elements.name: managerRelationship
elements.title: How would you rate your relationship with your direct manager?

elements.name: careerGrowth
elements.title: Do you see opportunities for career growth within the company?

elements.name: improvementSuggestion
elements.title: What is one thing the company could do to improve employee engagement?

elements.name: companyDirection
elements.title: How confident are you in the company's overall direction?

elements.name: additionalFeedback
elements.title: Do you have any additional feedback or suggestions for the company?
